name: SkyCar: Self-Flying Futuristic Flying Jet Car
name_original: SkyCar: Self-Flying Futuristic Flying Jet Car
description:
Are you tired of playing manual vehicle simulation games? Live your dream with advance futuristic flying car simulator. You get to experience the feel of an airplane flying high. You play as the pilot of our futuristic flying sports car. Needless to say, you can enjoy driving on the road in the city as well. But if the city drive gets too much, just take off and fly with your future flying car. Fly high into the skies and enjoy the flight!

SkyCar features include:

+ Game Center Achievements and Leaderboard
+ Futuristic flying car model
+ Realistic and dynamic car & airplane physics
+ New futuristic concept of flying vehicles simulator
+ Smooth flying controls over the city environment
+ Amazing 3D graphics
+ Adventure of flying a car as an airplane

Please send us your feedback and reviews so we can improve and create better content for you.
